DOC.detailed_description: A single blind prospective randomize control trial conduct family medicine outpatient clinic Jordan . The study enrol 199 patient meet National Cholesterol Education Program Adult Treatment Panel III ( NCEP/ATPIII ) criteria diagnosis MS upon time enrollment . Patients randomize : 110 participant intervention arm ( pharmacist-physician collaborative approach ) 89 control arm ( physician team ) . Only patient intervention arm provide pharmacist recommendation pharmaceutical care counseling .
